The battle around the Ark continues to rage as massive amounts of firepower=

are thrown from both the Maximal aide as well as the Predacon!

> <OLD>
>
=
> Outside the Ark, Rat Trap clings to Night Shift with his dear life,
feari=
ng that their distraction may not be enough to foil the sweeps.

<snip/cut/=
paste>

> Night Shift turns off the beaten path, and heads down a rather st=
eep
slope, as his tires roll over rough terrain, heading right for a patch =
of
heavy vegitation. His suspension system is now put to the test as he rol=
ls
along without a worry in the world, knowing that perhaps this would prov=
e
difficult for a sweep to follow him in such thick brush cover.
>
> "Okay,=
 hopefully this will get those air heads off our tail pipe."

<NEW>

As the=
 duo put the pedal to the metal and fly over the rough terrain they
are abl=
e to flee into the under the cover of a dense canopy of an ancient
forest. =
The path that Nightshift has chosen is extremely rough hewn, driving
over l=
arge stones and thickly gnarled roots. However as they flee further
into it=
, it gets darker and darker since much of the sun is blocked out from
over =
head. For the moment there is no visible sign of the sweeps, only dense
fol=
iage and the animals that are fleeing at the sight and sound of the large
v=
ehicle that is moving through!

> <OLD>
>
> Back at the Ark, Tucson realize=
s that he's lost Nightrazor for the moment,
and decides not to try a shot a=
t him. Instead, he concentrates and decides
it's best to just follow him. Y=
et he wanted Nightrazor to know he was there.
But without a fix on him, he =
had to start from scratch.
>
>
> He turns on the PA on his gauntlett.
>
> "=
 Don't make this harder than it has to be, Nightrazor."

<NEW>

There is no=
 answer from Nightrazor, there was only the buzzing sounds of
shorted relay=
s that are attempting to reset themselves. Straight Shot can
sometimes see =
the flicker of lights as the Ark attempted to right itself
with preceptor a=
nd legacy=92s help, but so far they are unsuccessful.

> <OLD>
>
> He narro=
ws his optics.
>
> " Rodimus, I need you to concentrate your vigil over the=
 sleeping
Autobots! And be sure no harm comes to Optimus Prime! I have a fe=
eling that
Nightrazor, our so called intruder has been sent here to destroy=
 his body
and those of our sleeping comrades! If one Autobot is touched, do=
 not
hesitate to do the same to a Decepticon! It's a life for a life and I'=
m NOT
taking anyone's scrap anymore!"

<NEW>

=93What do you mean take out =
a Deecpticon? You mean the invading Predacons
Right?!?=94

As Rodimus spoke=
, Perceptor came over the com channel . . .

> "By the love that you feel f=
or your Fellows and girlfriend, dont do it...
Dont ask
> that"begged Percep=
tor"I was sent to prevent any harm to Decepticons, I beg
you
> Tucson, dont=
 harm them... if you do it we dont know what consecuence it
will have to
> =
your precious Autobots and the future of the human being... and What will
h=
apen with
> my own Kind... "

Legacy=92s voice also came in over the same c=
hannel, =93Harm to either the
Autobots or the Decepticons or even inordinat=
e damage to the Ark may well
result in a temporal breach. I cannot allow th=
at to happen.=94

Tuscon=92s message came back over the channel . . .

> "R=
odimus, disregard that last request. But keep an eye on the chamber,
where =
the
> Autobots sleep. I have a feeling Nightrazor will indeed try to infilt=
rate
it, and lay harm
> to those who are fallen."

=93Gotcha!=94 Rodimus sa=
id, the relief in his voice could be clearly heard over
the sound of Rodimu=
s=92 revving motor in the background. =93I am in the chamber
now on the way=
 out. I don=92t see anything here, wait a minute . . . .=94

> <OLD>
>
> He=
 [Tuscon] transmits to Torca and the other Maximals.
>
> "Torca, if you can=
 hear me, I need you and the others to bare down on
Hydras and the other pr=
edacons with no holds barred! That means, if they
take anyone's life, or at=
tempt to, return the favor at will! They want to
play rough, they got it! B=
ecause if they think we're going to fall to them,
THEY'RE SADLY MISTAKEN!"
=

<NEW>

=93As you say!=94 Torca=92s voice booms over the channel. =93But bo=
th Hydras and
Cyclonus are here. We will need all the help we can get out h=
ere as soon as
you can!=94 There is a pause as he comes back with =93FRAG! =
Hydras is trying to
storm the door!=94

> Hydras smiled to the easy target =
and ignored Bantos he said By comlink
=93INFERNO,
>  Cyclonus and waspinato=
r... Follow me...=94
>
> After that Hydras attemped to enter the ARK!!!!


=

> Inside the Ark, Quickstride gets the message, and is swift to locate a
m=
anual control for
> the doors, and swiftly activates it by slamming a palm =
against the main
manual
> controller.
>
> "Read ya loud'n clear Torca, I go=
t it! No one's commn' in or outa here
unless they
> wanna risk their sorry =
afts ta do so."
>
> He then transforms into beast mode, and rears up.
>
> "=
 I got more kick power in this mode. Hooves are geat defense weapons,
'spec=
ially when ya wanna strike a bot below the belt, if ya know what I
mean, To=
rca.
>
> He charges in beast mode toward his enemys, at a strong trot and h=
efty
snort.


As Quickstride and Leo II come running out of the Ark, the do=
or of which was
beginning to lower, they could both see Hydras, followed by=
 Cyclonus,
Inferno and Waspinator flying directly at it! Powerful blasts fr=
om the
Predacons, although carefully aimed so as to only hit Leo, Quickstri=
de and
Torca who was rushing over to try to hold the door, made if difficul=
t to run
across the field of fire!


> <OLD>
>
> Windlord Opened fire again=
st  Deepstrike trying to impeding his entrance
to the Ark.
>
> Kup cursed a=
nd keep firing at Scourge and the sweeps.

<NEW>

Scourge was truly a menac=
e in the air, using his agility to out maneuver the
more landbound Autobot.=
 Kup was able to hit Scourge with a few glancing
blows, but Scourge was mad=
e of sterner stuff, and continued to rain down
fire on Kup.

Deepstryke on =
the other hand was built like a tank. He was definitely NOT
built for manuv=
erablity, but he was heavily armored. Like a cross between a
gun emplacemen=
t and a satellite Deepstryke took a few hits from Windlord,
but he kept ret=
urning fire with his powerful and precise cannons. However
for the moment W=
indlord seemed to be successful in keeping Deepstryke from
following Hydras=
 towards the Ark!

> <OLD>
>
> He [Tuscon] slams a foot down hard, and at t=
he same time, lets loose
another round of formidable sonar waves.

<NEW>

T=
here was no sound or movement in or near the room with Tuscon and Straight
=
Shot, however there was a new wave of sparks that ran through the Ark=92s
s=
ystems as once again Tuscon=92s wave wreaks havoc.

There is no sign of the=
 intruder with Tuscon, however a weak signal does
appear in the front chamb=
er, the very same chamber that held the font door,
as well as the fallen Au=
tobots and Decepticons! It would seem that the
intruder has used his time w=
isely and was attempting to make a fast get
away!

Meanwhile Hydras receive=
d a message from Deepstryke, =93Sir. I am detecting a
wave harmonic affect =
emanating from within the Ark.=94 Deepstryke was of
course talking about th=
e wave Tuscon was emimitting. =93Shall I attempt to
counter it?=94

Meanwhi=
le back inside the Ark:

> Elita squeezed Ramulu=92s hand and asaid quietly=
 =93I want my mommie... I want
her back
> as well as my dad=94

<NEW>

=93I=
 will get you to her as soon as I can. Come.=94 Romulus said. His voice was=

guff, unused to speaking to young Autobots. Turning to look around for a
m=
oment he glanced back at Elita. =93We have to get you to safety. =93Stay be=
hind
me.=94 He took off at a slow jog down one of the side hallways, occasi=
onally
looking back to be sure that Elita was keeping up.

Then Romulus sto=
pped as he came to be standing over two dark shapes lying on
the floor. =93=
Oh dear Primus!=94 he said. He looked back at Elita, shock and
fear in his =
optics, =93Stay back. You don=92t need to see this.=94

(TAG)

Preston
